item.description:
Last Winter I held the first International Card Game event where we played an Italian card game, Briscola and a Chinese card game Tichu.

For the next entry in the series, I have a very special opportunity.  My German friend has graciously offered to spend part of her last weekend here teaching some native card games.  We will be learning Skat, the national card game of Germany plus one other game we haven't decided yet (probably something popular in Bavaria or Austria).  And if people are still kicking around afterwards, it will become an open game night.

And, of course, no German themed meetup cannot be complete without some good quality beer.  ;-)  I'll have some on hand to share with my guests (please drink responsibly).

Doors open at 6, but we won't start teaching any games until 7 to give people a chance to get here from work.

Hope to see you for another round of globe-trotting! :-)

----------------------------

This is a  Mini-Meetup. Anyone can sign up, but I would please ask that you  allow new or previously inactive members get a slot if they are on the waiting list since there is limited seating.  Thanks. See this  discussion for more details.

----------------------------

 

Food theme: 

The theme for this event will be "anything that goes with beer".  I know, wicked creative theme this time, eh?  Bring whatever you want. :-)  I will try to have also generic, healthy snacks on hand for all diets.

 

About the location:  
This event will be hosted at a private residence, conveniently located at the intersections of Route 1 and Route 95.  If you need directions, just ask.  This is a housing complex, so please do NOT park in any numbered spaces.  There are no animals on the premises and the property should be child-friendly.  Look for Unit 901 since Meetup doesn't display addresses correctly! :-(

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Mini-Meetup: International Card Games 2 + Beer
